name: Yearning
description: This 2D horror game is set in Edo period of Japan. The girl notices that her old sister has disappeared. The girl will look for her and clues of her. What will the girl find in end of the story?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10.0 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
